name: JP Calc
body:
There are apps out there for magistrates which do everything under the sun, but sometimes all you want is a simple calculator and Â£20 is a bit steep for that.

For those situations, we have JP Calc. An HTML5 web app which has the essentials calculators you will need when on the bench.

**Still under development**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
